# TED University Economics Research Union

This website presents the student-led work of the TED University Economics Research Union.

Primary sections:
- / : Home page with the union overview and core initiatives
- /about.html : Mission and vision
- /events.html : Event updates and announcement entry point
- /erumag.html : ERUMAG publication archive
- /blog.html : Interviews, essays, and analysis
- /greentalks.html : Sustainability and climate-focused talks
- /fieldtalks.html : Economics talks and seminars
- /team.html : Board and team information
- /contact.html : Contact information

Key content types:
- Article pages under /article-*.html
- ERUMAG issue pages under /erumag-*.html
- PDF issues in the site root

Primary organization:
- TED University Economics Research Union
- Contact: eru@tedu.edu.tr

External profiles:
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tedueru
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@TEDUERU
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/erutedu/
